channel.title: CVE Feed for Nippon Television Network Corporation -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Nippon Television Network Corporation -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-6032|2024-08-04T20:16:23.900Z -- nippon%20television%20network%20corporation -- ntv%20news24
item.description: The NTV News24 prior to Ver.3.0.0 does not verify X.509 certificates from SSL servers, which allows man-in-the-middle attackers to spoof servers and obtain sensitive information via a crafted certificate.
